summary: Lead and front-end developer of the new version of the internal Castres Management System (ERP) that manage all the operations of the company.
title: Castres Management System

summary: API that aggregates, contextualizes and personalizes content for in-flight, destination or airport services for Air France and KLM.
title: Inspire API

summary: Application that manages all contact points available on Air France and KLM websites. Beginning of the rewriting of the application with Spring Boot, Java 11, and Angular 8.
title: Contact API

summary: Open source small application that generate JSON and PDF reports on newly developed features for Jira managed projects. Currently being rewritten with Svelte 3 and Tailwind CSS.
title: Test Report

summary: Third-party transmission application for the french local authorities official document validations.
title: Stela 3

summary: Semantic Web directory applicaiton that aggregates the contacts and organizations of the members of Université Côte d’Azur group.
title: Annuaire UCA

summary: In my second internship, I was part of the team that developed a flight booking application. It was my first app based on a modern development framework.
title: Aéroports Voyages

summary: The first application that I developed, an IT Service Management software for a start-up company I worked for as an intern.
title: IT Service Management software

content:
Hi I am Franck, a web developer.
I am in the web development because it evolves fast and I love learning. I keep myself up to date with the new trends and technologies, but I know how to put aside my eagerness to make wise decisions for companies and their real use cases.
I studied computer science at Nice Sophia-Antipolis University and speaks English and French. I love building tech, from PCs to mechanical keyboards, and PC gaming.

title: About me
